attributes.action: Not to Quit But Britian Supports You!!! Stay in Number TEN!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as the British public want to show that you are doing a good job and value to work and stress of running are country I want to Petition that you STAY in your job until the next election and wish you the best of luck with not giving into this media and conservatives.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
